Html:
Hi

Is it possible to get a route off line, I have cached the map set the mode to cacheonly
also 
  with gmapMap
            .CacheLocation = c:\myCache\GMAP.NET\
            .Manager.Mode = GMap.NET.AccessMode.CacheOnly
            .Manager.UseRouteCache = True
            .Manager.UseDirectionsCache = True
            .Manager.UseGeocoderCache = True
            .Manager.UsePlacemarkCache = True
In my routing

Dim rp As RoutingProvider = gmapMap.MapProvider

myRoute = rp.GetRoute(myStart, myEnd, True, False, 15)


but myroute is always nothing Is this possible to get the route with no internet connection.

Any help appreciated.

Regards
Colin
